document.masterDocTitle: Phylogeny of the Zoroasteridae (Zorocallina; Forcipulatida): evolutionary events in deep-sea Asteroidea displaying Palaeozoic features

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Phylogeny of the Zoroasteridae (Zorocallina; Forcipulatida): evolutionary events in deep-sea Asteroidea displaying Palaeozoic features
Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society

subSubSection.paragraph: Occurrence : North Atlantic (off Massachusetts), Faeroe Channel, Rockall Trough (north-east Atlantic), to Bahamas , Gulf of Mexico, and Surinam . South Atlantic to Shag Rocks, South Georgia Sea, to Indian Ocean ( South Africa ) 220–4810 m .
